title: Elisha’s Final Prophecy and Death
summary: Jehoahaz and his son Jehoash reign in Israel and continue idol worship. Elisha, on his deathbed, gives King Jehoash a symbolic prophecy of partial victory over Syria. After Elisha dies, his bones miraculously bring a dead man back to life.

faq.question: What prophecy did Elisha give Jehoash?
faq.answer: That he would defeat the Syrians three times but not destroy them completely.

faq.question: What miracle occurred after Elisha’s death?
faq.answer: A man was revived after touching Elisha’s bones.
